languages.text: "Признаться, я никогда ничего не чинила... Только штопала прорехи на платье. Но буду прилежно учиться сервиторианскому мастерству, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}!" {n}Глаза Мейв лучатся благодарностью.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: реверансит, уходит — и больше не появится в каюте.

traits.locale_text: "Признаться, я никогда ничего не чинила... Только штопала прорехи на платье. Но буду прилежно учиться сервиторианскому мастерству, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}!" {n}Глаза Лидзи лучатся благодарностью.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_Lizzy

languages.translation_comment: реверансит, уходит — и больше не появится в каюте.

languages.text: "I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Признаться, я никогда ничего не чинила... Только штопала прорехи на платье. Но буду прилежно учиться сервиторианскому мастерству, Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}!" {n}Глаза Мейв лучатся благодарностью.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Honestly, I've never mended anything... Just sewn up rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

"Honestly, I've never mended anything... Just sewn up rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

"I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

"I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich muss zugeben, ich habe noch nie etwas repariert ... bis auf einige Risse in meinem Kleid. Aber ich werde das Servitorenhandwerk eifrig lernen, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}!" {n}Maives Augen strahlen vor Dankbarkeit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss zugeben, ich habe noch nie etwas repariert ... bis auf einige Risse in meinem Kleid. Aber ich werde das Servitorenhandwerk eifrig lernen, {mf|mein himmlischer Herr|meine himmlische Herrin}!" {n}Maives Augen strahlen vor Dankbarkeit.{/n}

languages.text: « Je dois avouer que je n'ai jamais rien réparé... à part des déchirures sur ma robe. Mais j'apprendrai diligemment le travail d'un servitor, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! » {n}s'exclame Maive avec un regard scintillant de gratitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je dois avouer que je n'ai jamais rien réparé... à part des déchirures sur ma robe. Mais j'apprendrai diligemment le travail d'un servitor, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! » {n}s'exclame Maive avec un regard scintillant de gratitude.{/n}

languages.text: 「正直に申し上げますと、これまで何かをちゃんと直したことはないのです…ドレスのほつれを縫ったくらいです。ですが、サーヴィターの技術は一生懸命覚えます！天の{mf|君|姫}」{n}メイヴの瞳には、感謝の光が輝いていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「正直に申し上げますと、これまで何かをちゃんと直したことはないのです…ドレスのほつれを縫ったくらいです。ですが、サーヴィターの技術は一生懸命覚えます！天の{mf|君|姫}」{n}メイヴの瞳には、感謝の光が輝いていた。{/n}

languages.text: «Debo admitir que nunca he reparado nada... como mucho, algún zurcido en el vestido. ¡Pero me esforzaré en aprender las tareas de un servidor, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial!». {n}Los ojos de Maive brillan con agradecimiento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Debo admitir que nunca he reparado nada... como mucho, algún zurcido en el vestido. ¡Pero me esforzaré en aprender las tareas de un servidor, mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial!». {n}Los ojos de Maive brillan con agradecimiento.{/n}

languages.text: “我得承认，我从来没修过任何东西……只缝补过裙子上的口子。不过，我会努力学习机仆的手艺，来自上界的大人！”{n}梅芙的双眼中闪烁着感激之情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我得承认，我从来没修过任何东西……只缝补过裙子上的口子。不过，我会努力学习机仆的手艺，来自上界的大人！”{n}梅芙的双眼中闪烁着感激之情。{/n}

languages.text: "İtiraf edeyim, daha önce hiçbir şey tamir etmedim. Elbisemin birkaç yırtığını yamadım sadece. Hizmetörlük zanaatını öğrenmek için çok çalışacağım Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}!" {n}Maive'in gözleri minnetle ışıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I must admit, I've never mended anything... just sewn up some rips in my dress. But I'll be diligent in learning a servitor's craft, my Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}!" {n}Maive's eyes are radiant with gratitude.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İtiraf edeyim, daha önce hiçbir şey tamir etmedim. Elbisemin birkaç yırtığını yamadım, o kadar. Hizmetör zanaatini öğrenmek için çok çalışacağım Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}!" {n}Maive'in gözleri minnetle ışıldıyor.{/n}
